item.title: NixOS
item.description: Original article https://nixos.org/nixos/about.html Nix package manager 1 which nix /home/shane/.nix-profile/bin/nix Basic package management https://nixos.org/nix/manual/#ch-basic-package-mgmt 1 ci nix-env -qa | nnf "nix-env -qa" | xa -l head -n 10 /home/shane/notes/vars/nix-env-qa 0x0-2018-06-24 1password-0.5.6-003 2048-in-terminal-2017-11-29 20kly-1.4 2bwm-0.2 2fa-1.1.0 389-ds-base-1.3.9.1 3dpong-0.5 4store-1.1.6 8086tiny-1.25 1 ncf nix-env -qas | xa -l head -n 10 /home/shane/notes/vars/nix-env --S 0x0-2018-06-24 --S 2048-in-terminal-2017-11-29 --S 20kly-1.4 --S 2bwm-0.2 --S 2fa-1.
